Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.GameView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visualizable
public class GameView extends javafx.application.Application implements Visualizable
This class represents the game window and draws all the needed stuff that the server updates and requests
